headline: Seaport downgrades MGM, lifts Macau casino forecasts as Las Vegas outlook weakens
summary: Investing.com -- Seaport Research downgraded MGM Resorts (NYSE:MGM) and MGM China (OTC:MCHVY) to Neutral given a slowdown in Las Vegas and limited upside after a strong run in Macau stocks, even as it raised its Macau gaming forecasts and estimates for several companies.

raw.headline: Seaport downgrades MGM, lifts Macau casino forecasts as Las Vegas outlook weakens
raw.summary: Investing.com -- Seaport Research downgraded MGM Resorts (NYSE:MGM) and MGM China (OTC:MCHVY) to Neutral given a slowdown in Las Vegas and limited upside after a strong run in Macau stocks, even as it raised its Macau gaming forecasts and estimates for several companies.

headline: ESTUARY POWER COMMENCES OPERATION OF ESCAPE SOLAR AND STORAGE PROJECT AND CLOSES ADDITIONAL FINANCING
summary: Estuary Power is delighted to announce the commencement of operations of its Escape Solar and Storage project in Lincoln County, Nevada.
